title: Number of Steps to Zero
description: Given a non-negative integer num, return the number of steps to reduce it to zero. If the current number is even, divide it by 2. If odd, subtract 1 from it.

explanation.approach: Follow the rules: if number is even, halve it; if odd, subtract one. Count each operation.
explanation.analogy: Like counting steps to climb down a ladder - each rung is either a big step (divide) or small step (subtract).
steps: If even: divide by 2 (big step down)

title: Subtract Product and Sum
description: Given an integer n, return the difference between the product of its digits and the sum of its digits.

explanation.approach: Extract each digit one by one. Keep a running product and sum. Return their difference.
explanation.analogy: Like taking apart a number into its pieces - multiply them together for product, add them for sum, then subtract.
steps: Multiply it into product, add to sum

title: Integer to Roman
description: Convert an integer to a Roman numeral.

explanation.approach: Greedy approach - always use the largest Roman numeral that fits.
explanation.analogy: Like making change with coins - use the biggest coin possible, then move to smaller ones.
steps: Create mapping of values to Roman symbols
While number >= current value, output symbol and subtract

title: Roman to Integer
description: Convert a Roman numeral string to an integer.

explanation.approach: Scan left to right. If current value is less than next, subtract it.
explanation.analogy: Reading backwards logic - if a small letter comes before a big one, it means 'minus'.
steps: Create function to convert each Roman letter to value
Compare current value with next value

title: Day of Year
description: Given a date string in format YYYY-MM-DD, return which day of the year it is.

explanation.approach: Parse the date, sum up all days from previous months, add current day.
explanation.analogy: Like counting pages in a book - add all pages of previous chapters plus current page.
steps: Parse year, month, and day from string
Sum days of all months before current month

title: Day of the Week
description: Given a date, return the name of the day using Zeller's congruence.

explanation.approach: Use Zeller's congruence - a formula that calculates day of week from any date.
explanation.analogy: Like a magic formula that tells you what day any calendar date was/will be.
steps: Adjust month and year for Jan/Feb

title: Cells with Odd Values
description: Given matrix and increment operations, count cells with odd values.

explanation.approach: Track increments per row/column. Cell value = row_count + col_count.
explanation.analogy: Like counting traffic at intersections - each car passes for every increment.
steps: Count increments for each row and column
For each cell, its value = rowCount + colCount
If sum is odd, increment answer
explanation.complexity: Time: O(m×n + k), Space: O(m + n)

title: Shift 2D Grid
description: Shift all elements k times circularly.

explanation.approach: Flatten 2D to 1D, circular shift, reshape back.
explanation.analogy: Like a conveyor belt - items move forward with last wrapping to front.
steps: Calculate new position for each element
explanation.complexity: Time: O(m × n), Space: O(m × n)

title: Replace Elements with Greatest
description: Replace each element with the greatest element to its right.

explanation.approach: Scan right to left, track max seen so far.
explanation.analogy: Like looking over your shoulder - each person reports the tallest behind them.
steps: Replace current with max, update max if needed

title: Sort by Number of 1 Bits
description: Sort array by number of 1s in binary. If tied, sort by value.

explanation.approach: Count 1 bits in each number. Sort by bit count, then by value.
explanation.analogy: Like sorting students by test score, then by name if tied.
